Lets your [[agent]] returns the data value of the block in the specified direction.

==Syntax==

: <code>inspectdata <direction: string></code>

==Arguments==

<code>direction: string</code>
: Specifies the direction of Agent to verify the data value of the block.
: Must be one of:
:* <code>forward</code> to inspect the block on the front.
:* <code>back</code> to inspect the block on the back.
:* <code>left</code> to inspect the block on the left-hand side.
:* <code>right</code> to inpect the block on the right-hand side.
:* <code>up</code> to inspect the block on the top-hand side.
:* <code>down</code> to inspect the block on the bottom-hand side.

==Result==

Fails if the arguments are not specified correctly.

On success, returns the data value of the block in the specified direction. See [[Data values|block id]] for the complete list.
